definition: to imagine/to assume/to envisage/tentative plan/to have consideration for
to set up/to arrange/to establish/to found/to display
to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)

sentences.english: It would also give Druids more crowd control power than they are intended to have.
sentences.chinese: 这也会给德鲁依带来比设想中强的群体控制技能。

sentences.english: To explain why, let's dream up a science-fiction transportation system.
sentences.chinese: 为了解释原因，我们设想科幻小说中的交通系统。

sentences.english: Imagine two people watching a beam of light.
sentences.chinese: 设想有两个人在观察一束光。

sentences.english: Henry ford envisaged an important future for the motorcar.
sentences.chinese: 亨利福特为汽车设想了光明的远景。

sentences.english: A tentative plan of the urbane-conomic regions is finally proposed.
sentences.chinese: 最后提出了建立以城市为中心经济区的设想。

sentences.english: Thirdly the nanoporous random laser is brought forward.
sentences.chinese: 提出了纳米孔隙随机激光器的设想。

sentences.english: Imagine, these lowdown Southern segregationists put the Northern Democrats down.
sentences.chinese: 设想，南方隔离主义的内幕束缚北方民主党。

sentences.english: The assumption of an ever-increasing standard of living is no longer taken for granted.
sentences.chinese: 生活标准会持续增长的设想也不再是想当然的了。

sentences.english: Our general manager, Mr. Liu's idea is the best.
sentences.chinese: 我们刘总经理提出的设想最好。

sentences.english: God forbid I assume LOL means “lots of love”.
sentences.chinese: 上帝不准我把LOL设想为“许多爱”的英文缩写。

sentences.english: The idea of voice-activated search has been around for some time.
sentences.chinese: 用语音激活进行搜索的设想由来已久。

sentences.english: Real-world evidence does not support the Keynesianism perspective.
sentences.chinese: 真实世界的证据并不支持凯恩斯主义思想的设想。

sentences.english: Suggestions for the development of Lime Stone Arboretum were made.
sentences.chinese: 提出石山树木园的发展前景设想和建议。

sentences.english: He seemed positively scandalized at my suggestion.
sentences.chinese: 我的设想似乎引起他极大的反感。

sentences.english: We cannot imagine having no experience.
sentences.chinese: 没有经验的生活是不堪设想的。

sentences.english: Above, an artist's conception of the Space Launch System blasting off.
sentences.chinese: 图中，艺术家设想的太空发射系统点火升空了。

definition: way of thinking/opinion/notion/to think of a way (to do sth)/CL:個|个[ge4]
to put into practice/to carry out (idiom)
to design/to plot/to plan out/to compose/to draw a mental sketch/conception/plan/idea/composition
plan/project/program/to plan/to map out/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]
